quote.text: And still, after all this time, the sun never says to the earth, ‘You owe me.’ Look what happens with a love like that. It lights the whole sky.
quote.author: Hafiz

scripture.text: I have loved you with an everlasting love; I have drawn you with unfailing kindness.

message:
Hey Ms sunshine🩷

Just wanted to say something simple tonight: you're genuinely such a beautiful person ... in how you speak, how you move, and how you just are.

You don’t have to try hard to be impressive. You just are.

God’s love for you? It’s real. Always has been. *“I have loved you with an everlasting love.”* That kind of love sticks. It doesn’t fade or change and honestly, it makes sense… because someone like you? You’re one of one.

I hope your Monday felt good. And even if it was just a regular day, I hope you feel how appreciated you are. You deserve to feel safe, valued, and at peace . As always I am proud of you 🦋
